pl.touk.hades.sql.timemonitoring
Class SqlTimeBasedMonitorImpl

java.lang.Object
  pl.touk.hades.sql.timemonitoring.SqlTimeBasedMonitorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionListener, Monitor, SqlTimeBasedMonitor
public class SqlTimeBasedMonitorImpl
extends Object
implements SqlTimeBasedMonitor

Monitor that activates failover when the main data source is overloaded in comparison to the failover data source.

Author:
Michal Sokolowski

connectionRequestedFromHades

public void connectionRequestedFromHades(boolean success,
                                         boolean failover,
                                         long timeNanos)
Description copied from interface: ConnectionListener
Used by a hades to inform this listener what is the result of every connection request.

Specified by:
connectionRequestedFromHades in interface ConnectionListener
Parameters:
success - true if hades successfully got a connection from one of underlying data sources; false otherwise
failover - true if hades attempted to get the connection from the failover data source; false otherwise
timeNanos - how long hades waited for the connection from one of underlying date sources in case of success; or how long hades waited before an exception was thrown while getting the connection

isFailoverActive

public boolean isFailoverActive()
Description copied from interface: Monitor
Returns true if failover is active and false otherwise. This method controls the process of switching between tha main and the failover data sources contained inside the hades associated with this monitor. For more details see methods Hades.getConnection() and Hades.getConnection(String, String) which invoke this method to learn whether failover is active or not.

Specified by:
isFailoverActive in interface Monitor
Returns:
true if failover is active or false otherwise
